scripts.lint: tslint lib/**/*.ts && tslint test/**/*.ts && tslint bin/*.ts
scripts.pretest: typings install && tsc && npm run lint
scripts.precoverage: typings install && tsc && npm run lint
scripts.coverage: istanbul cover _mocha test/**/*-test.js -- -R spec && remap-istanbul -i ./coverage/coverage.json -o ./coverage/ts-report -t html && ./node_modules/.bin/remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage.json -t lcovonly > coverage/lcov-ts.info
scripts.typedoc: typedoc --excludePrivate --excludeNotExported --excludeExternals --readme docs/api_readme.md --out docs/api --name 'Bespoken Tools' --mode file lib/client/bst-alexa.ts lib/client/bst-encode.ts lib/client/lambda-server.ts lib/alexa/audio-item.ts
scripts.preversion: npm run typedoc && git add docs/api && git commit -m 'Updated generated API docs'
